      • discontinueSubject

        public SubjectDTO discontinueSubject(SubjectDTO subjectDto)
        Discontinue the given subject.

        A discontinued subject is not deleted from the database, but will be prevented from logging into the system, sending data, or otherwise interacting with the system.

        Parameters:
        subjectDto - the subject to discontinue
        Returns:
        the discontinued subject

      • assignOrUpdateSource

        @Transactional
public MinimalSourceDetailsDTO assignOrUpdateSource(Subject subject,
                                                                   SourceType sourceType,
                                                                   Project project,
                                                                   MinimalSourceDetailsDTO sourceRegistrationDto)
        Creates or updates a source for a subject. It creates and assigns a source of a for a dynamicallyRegister-able sourceType. Currently, it is allowed to create only once source of a dynamicallyRegistrable sourceType per subject. Otherwise finds the matching source and updates meta-data.

      • getSources

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • findRevision

        public SubjectDTO findRevision(java.lang.String login,
                               java.lang.Integer revision)
                        throws NotFoundException
        Get a specific revision for a given subject.
        Parameters:
        login - the login of the subject
        revision - the revision number
        Returns:
        the subject at the given revision
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if there was no subject with the given login at the given revision number

      • getLatestRevision

        public SubjectDTO getLatestRevision(java.lang.String login)
                             throws NotFoundException
        Get latest known revision of a subject with the given login.
        Parameters:
        login - the login of the subject
        Returns:
        the latest revision for that subject
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if no subject was found with the given login

      • findOneByLogin

        @Nonnull
public Subject findOneByLogin(java.lang.String login)

        Parameters:
        login - of subject to look for.
        Returns:
        Subject loaded.

      • getPrivacyPolicyUrl

        protected java.net.URL getPrivacyPolicyUrl(Subject subject)
        Gets relevant privacy-policy-url for this subject.

        If the active project of the subject has a valid privacy-policy-url returns that url. Otherwise, it loads the default URL from ManagementPortal configurations that is general.

        Parameters:
        subject - to get relevant policy url
        Returns:
        URL of privacy policy for this token
